PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-14502012-11-01,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActProtection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Act
SubjectProtection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Regulations
PrecisPROTECTION OF RESIDENTIAL MORTGAGE OR HYPOTHECARY INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to outline the criteria that a lender must meet before it can be designated as a qualified mortgage lender by an approved mortgage insurer under the Protection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Act, including minimum capital requirements, and experience requirements related to underwriting and administering mortgage loans.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0231 Publication Date: 2012-11-21
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Protection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Act
subject: Protection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Regulations
precis: PROTECTION OF RESIDENTIAL MORTGAGE OR HYPOTHECARY INSURANCE REGULATIONS in order to outline the criteria that a lender must meet before it can be designated as a qualified mortgage lender by an approved mortgage insurer under the Protection of Residential Mortgage or Hypothecary Insurance Act, including minimum capital requirements, and experience requirements related to underwriting and administering mortgage loans.
